info.title: UserVoice
info.description: UserVoice is a product management and customer support tool that allows businesses to build a suggestions portal for their users to submit feature ideas, build a ticketing system for customer support and build articles knowledge base for users.

get.description: Retrieves item metadata for UserVoice object type
Retrieves item metadata for UserVoice object type
Retrieves all datasets available to the connection
Retrieves UserVoice items of a certain UserVoice type (example: 'Suggestion')

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to retrieve (default = 512)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).
